title: Stunning Location, Great Amenities, Walking Distance To Park & Ride
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Discovery West, a new apartment community in Issaquah Highlands, offers all new luxury apartments and townhomes.
Our spacious, contemporary, apartments offer everything you could ask for, and some things you may have only dreamed of!
The gracious amenities, spacious floor plans, and central location make us the ideal choice for your next home.
Get all of the advantages of contemporary urban living in an upscale neighborhood community.
Issaquah Highlands is the most desirable community in the surrounding area because everywhere you want to be is within easy reach.
Interstate 90 is less than a mile away, making commuting a breeze.
Grand Ridge plaza is just walking distance making shopping, groceries, and fine dining all convenient while breathtaking mountain views and relaxing walking trails are just outside your front door.
Be among the very first residents to live at Discovery West and reserve your new home today.
We look forward to meeting you and helping you find your new home.
*Rent prices are subject to change at any time.

Square footage amounts include patio and storage areas.***For households with Section 8 vouchers, the applicable public housing authority approves rents in accordance with program regulations.****Preferred leasing status may be given to households that qualify as disabled, large or whose income is less than 50% of the AMI.
$40 per person over 18 years of age
$65 for compact spaces and $95 for standard in the A-building parking garage,
